actions.name: Witchery
actions.description: Effect: While Gloomy Weather is active, Major Status Afflictions affecting the user tick down by 2 every Activation instead of 1. The user is treated as having the Fairy Type for the effects of Gloomy Weather.

system.description: Effect: While Gloomy Weather is active, Major Status Afflictions affecting the user tick down by 2 every Activation instead of 1. The user is treated as having the Fairy Type for the effects of Gloomy Weather.
